mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN grado = 'A' THEN 0 END) AS lideres_a, COUNT(CASE WHEN grado = 'B' THEN 0 END) AS lideres_b, COUNT(CASE WHEN estado = 'Activo' THEN 0 END) AS lideres_activos, COUNT(CASE WHEN estado = 'No Activo' THEN 0 END) AS lideres_no_activos FROM mae_lider;
SELECT * FROM mae_lider ORDER BY idLider ASC

SELECT c.nombres, c.apellidos, l.estado, l.area_servicio, l.rol AS grado, l.lider_celular, msmz.nombre AS sector_ministerio FROM mae_lider l LEFT JOIN mae_cristiano c ON l.idcristiano = c.idcristiano LEFT JOIN mae_celula mc ON c.idcelula = mc.idcelula LEFT JOIN mae_supervision ms ON mc.idsupervision = ms.idsupervision LEFT JOIN mae_sector_minis_zonal msmz ON ms.idsector_ministerio = msmz.idsector_ministerio ORDER BY l.idlider ASC

SELECT c.nombres, c.apellidos, c.edad, c.fec_nacimiento, c.direccion, c.sexo, c.estado_civil, l.rol, c.procedencia, c.ocupacion, c.grado_profesional, l.lider_celular, l.lider_servidor, l.area_servicio, l.estado, mc.numero_celula, mc.nombre_lider, ms.nombre_supervision, ms.nombre_supervisor, msmz.nombre AS nombre_ministerio, msmz.nombre_col_past, mz.nombre AS nombre_zona, mz.nombre_ps_zonal, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mae_celula WHERE idlider = l.idcristiano) AS cantidad_celulas, (SELECT ARRAY_AGG(comentario) FROM mae_comentario WHERE idcristiano = c.idcristiano) AS comentarios FROM mae_lider l LEFT JOIN mae_cristiano c ON l.idcristiano = c.idcristiano LEFT JOIN mae_celula mc ON c.idcelula = mc.idcelula LEFT JOIN mae_supervision ms ON mc.idsupervision = ms.idsupervision LEFT JOIN mae_sector_minis_zonal msmz ON ms.idsector_ministerio = msmz.idsector_ministerio LEFT JOIN mae_zona mz ON msmz.idzona = mz.idzona WHERE l.idlider = #{idLider}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mae_lider (idCristiano, grado, lider_servidor, area_servicio, estado, lider_celular, rol) VALUES (#{idCristiano}, #{grado}, #{liderServidor}, #{areaServicio}, #{estado}, #{liderCelular}, #{rol})
mapper.update: UPDATE mae_lider SET idCristiano = #{idCristiano}, grado = #{grado}, lider_servidor = #{liderServidor}, area_servicio = #{areaServicio}, estado = #{estado}, lider_celular = #{liderCelular}, rol = #{rol} WHERE idLider = #{idLider}
